        Parameters:

        port: - the port where the registry is registered.
        remObjName: - the name of the remote object.
        roundTime: - the lenght of a round in seconds.

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String username,
                     GUIControllerInterface guiController,
                     int mapId)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method called when a user want to join to a match. It verify of there is already a created match, if no create it. Start the timer of setup, create a new virtualView and a new player and initialize all all the virtualView and call the related method to update the remoteView.
        Specified by:
        register in interface RMIServerInterface
        Parameters:
        username: - the name choose by the user.
        guiController: - the reference of the client
        mapId: - the number of the mao
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the method can't do the remote call to the client.

      • usePowerUp

        public void usePowerUp(java.lang.String username,
                       int index,
                       PowerUpShot powerUpShot)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that call the related model method to apply the effect of a powerUp. It sets the targeting player, the damaging player and removed the powerUp from the hand of the player.
        Specified by:
        usePowerUp in interface RMIServerInterface
        Parameters:
        username: - the player who want to use the powerUp
        index: - index in the hand of the powerUp

        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the method can't do the remote call to the client.

      • startingMatchTimer

        public void startingMatchTimer()
        Implement a timer that each second check how many user are registred to the match. If there is three players the timer is deleted and the setMatchTimer is called.

      • setMatchTimer

        public void setMatchTimer()
        Implement a timer that each second call the countMatchTimer method.

      • countMatchTimer

        private final int countMatchTimer()
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Each second the interval variable is decreased, if it is equals to 1, the openConnection variable of the match is set to false. It means that nobody can connect him to the current match. The method browse each virtualView saved into the ArrayList allVirtualView to gain the clientRef and call a method that shows the GUI on each client.
        Returns:
        the interval variable decreased by 1.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the method can't do the remote call to the client

      • passRoundTimer

        public void passRoundTimer()
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        passRoundTimer is called when roundTimer variable is equals to 1. It means the current player has not pass the round so he become suspended. The round is passed to the next player not suspended. If in the match remains only two player tha match will finish.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the method can't do a remote call to the client.

      • setResetTimer

        public void setResetTimer()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Implement a timer that each second call the countSeconds methos
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • countSeconds

        public final int countSeconds()
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        A method call by the timer each second that decrease roundTime variable. When roundTime variable is equals to 1 another method is called and roundTime varibale is intialized.
        Returns:
        roundTime decreased of 1.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • finishMatch

        public void finishMatch()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is called when final frenzy finish or when after a disconnection only two user remains in the match. The method computes the damage on all player-boards and computes the points to assign to each player for each kill.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if the client isn't reachable.
